info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:32AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Winnebago and northwestern Boone Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 231 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Beloit to Winnebago. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockford, Belvidere, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, South Beloit, Rockton, Poplar Grove, Candlewick Lake, Cherry Valley, Winnebago, Pecatonica, Timberlane, Seward, Caledonia, Shirland and Harrison. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 122 and 123. I-90 between mile markers 1 and 19. This includes... Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, Rockford Rivets Baseball, and Rockford Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central Illinois.
